name: Harvest "Harvest Simulator" Simulator
description:
I’m sure we’re gonna playtest too many farming Simulator games this jam… Have a break and harvest some farming simulator developers and enjoyers!

You play as the Grim Reaper controlling a harvester machine puppet. Harvest as many farming simulator developers and enjoyers you can while avoiding the bombs. And don’t let them escape!

A game for Ludum Dare 52 (Compo): Harvest

Rate the game here: https://ldj.am/$315751

Enjoy!
